bibl.title: "L. Klaudios Ioulianos": Prefect of Egypt.
bibl.note: Revision of I.G. II, 2, 4206. With the identification of this inscription as one of the testimonia vitae of Claudius Julianus, the Egyptian prefect's praenomen has finally been recovered.
bibl.seg: Miller Martin C.J., "L. Klaudios Ioulianos": Prefect of Egypt.
Revision of I.G. II, 2, 4206. With the identification of this inscription as one of the testimonia vitae of Claudius Julianus, the Egyptian prefect's praenomen has finally been recovered.
